60 About Global Reporting Initiative 
Global Reporting Initiative
 
This online Sustainability Supplement is based on the Global Reporting Initiative’s (GRI) G3 guidelines, and covers all GRI indicators relating to Aegon’s activities and businesses. For more information about GRI, please see globalreporting.org. 
Aegon is an Organizational Stakeholder of the GRI, and is currently working along with other companies on new, updated guidelines, 
which will be issued as the G4 guidelines in the first half of 2013. The GRI has assessed the Application Level of Aegon’s 2012 Review and Sustainability Supplement as A+. 
For more information on how Aegon complies with the GRI’s G3 reporting principles and indicators, please follow the links below:
